**Request for Standing Offer: Compressed Gases**
================================================================

**Reference Number:** WS4320407414-Doc4348370731

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-11
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-23T14:00:00

**Compressed Gases Required**
-----------------------------

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), Atlantic Region, invites qualified contractors to submit a Standing Offer for various compressed gases to support meteorological and scientific/analytical services at its upper air monitoring stations and laboratories throughout the region.

**Specifications and Deliverables**
--------------------------------

The Standing Offer is for the supply of compressed gases, including:

* Non-metals and pure and elemental gases (e.g., nitrogen, noble gases)
* Helium gas
* Air or gas tanks or cylinders

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
------------------------------

This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). Delivery locations are restricted to Nova Scotia and New Brunswick.

**Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------------------------------

Tender response will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price criteria. Interested suppliers may access the opportunity on the SAP Ariba portal: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18245200](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18245200)

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For inquiries, please contact Heather Walsh with the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC): heather.walsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca (she/her)
